fi.tuni.tiko.coordinateSystem

Class MapPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
      • fi.tuni.tiko.coordinateSystem.MapPosition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>, java.io.Serializable

    public class MapPosition
extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
    Coordinate system for all elements that adhere to the map 1 unit = 1 tile Includes methods for converting between different coordinate systems Extends Vector2 so you can use all functions of vector2 without conversions
    See Also:
